networkplugin.name: Madvertise
networkplugin.info_content:
Network Info

madvertise is the specialist in mobile advertising and offers a wide range mobile websites and applications in Europe. Our technology and platform is specially adapted for mobile needs to secure fast and efficient mobile campaign placement. For our publishers and app developers, we achieve the highest effective CPMs and CPCs in the market.

Ad Formats

Madvertise supports both Banner Ads and Text Ads

Best Countries

Germany
